richTextDescription: Nicknamed 'The Fashion Gardener' for his vibrant botanical prints, Mr Ken Scott helped develop the floral motifs we now so readily associate with the '60s and '70s. Gucci's silk-crepe shorts showcase oversized daisies from the American designer's archive and are appliqu√©d with an emblem on the back.
name: Ken Scott Wide-Leg Floral-Print Silk-Crepe Shorts
